rooms.description: Large entrance with reception area and storage
Spacious living room with central seating area facing the courtyard
Elegant dining space adjacent to the living room
Modern kitchen with sufficient storage and ventilation
Guest bedroom with ensuite bathroom for visitors
Well-equipped private gym area integrated into the ground floor layout

courtyard_details.description: Central courtyard designed for natural light and ventilation, aligning with Vastu principles

rooms.description: Master bedroom with private balcony and en-suite bathroom; positioned in the northeast for positive energy as per Vastu
Secondary bedroom facing north to ensure good light
Tertiary bedroom with south orientation for balance
Dedicated study area in the east wing
